SEARCH
Package database

Class CreateDb

java.lang.Object
database.CreateDb
public class CreateDb extends Object
The CreateDb class is responsible for managing the database schema for the application. It provides methods to create, delete, and manage tables within the database. This class depends on the DbConnection class to get database connections.

      SQLException - if there is a problem executing the SQL query

    • createTableTypesOfRooms

      public void createTableTypesOfRooms() throws SQLException
      Creates the 'typesOfRooms' table in the database, which includes a predefined list of room types. This method might interact with the FillDb class to populate the table with initial data.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a problem executing the SQL query

      public void createTableFurnitures() throws SQLException

    • createTableTypesOfFurniture

      public void createTableTypesOfFurniture() throws SQLException
      Creates the 'typesOfFurnitures' table in the database if it does not exist. This table stores predefined types of furniture. This method might interact with the FillDb class to populate the table with initial data.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL command

    • createTableCreatedRooms

      public void createTableCreatedRooms() throws SQLException
      Deletes the 'typesOfFurnitures' table from the database if it exists. This method might interact with the FillDb class to populate the table with initial data.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL command

    • createTableAddedFurnitureInRoom

      public void createTableAddedFurnitureInRoom() throws SQLException
      Creates the 'addedFurniture' table in the database if it does not exist. This table stores mappings of which furniture items are added to which rooms.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL command

    • deleteTableAddedFurniture

      public void deleteTableAddedFurniture() throws SQLException
      Deletes the 'addedFurniture' table from the database if it exists.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL command

    • createTableAssessmentOfApartments

      public void createTableAssessmentOfApartments() throws SQLException
      Creates the 'assessmentOfApartments' table in the database if it does not exist. This table stores assessments or ratings for apartments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL command

    • createTableUsersVotes

      public void createTableUsersVotes() throws SQLException
      Creates the 'usersVote' table in the database if it does not exist. This table records votes or ratings by users on apartments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL command

    • createTableNotification

      public void createTableNotification() throws SQLException
      Creates the 'notifications' table in the database if it does not exist. This table stores notifications for users concerning apartments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL command
